channel.title: Recursion on David J Nevin

item.title: Vim Commands
item.description: Too Many Vim Commands These are based on my obsidian notes from when I started using Vim in April of 2021. Stage One Commands There were too many commands to get stated, so following the advise of The Primeagen Youtube Channel, I’m focusing for my first week on the following commands. w, b, h, j, k, l, y, p, d, v, V, u, :w and :q. Stage One Commands Explained command explanation w move forward one word b backwards one word h, j, k, l left, down, up, right y yank p paste/put d delete v enter visual mode V enter line select visual mode u undo :w write file/save :q quit Stage Two Commands The goals is to feel comfortable with the week one commands before moving on.
